lead_paragraph: One of the foremost performance artists of the 1970s, Mr. Burden was perhaps the single best-known practitioner of the subgenre of body art.

headline.print_headline: Chris Burden, 69, a Conceptualist With Scars, Dies
headline.main: Chris Burden, a Conceptualist With Scars, Dies at 69

snippet: One of the foremost performance artists of the 1970s, Mr. Burden was perhaps the single best-known practitioner of the subgenre of body art.
abstract: Chris Burden, who repeatedly exposed himself to physical injury as one of the foremost performance artists of the 1970s, dies at age 69.
